thread.section_title: Italki 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Italki 的点评意见 | www.italki.com
thread.title: Luke Caruso
thread.title_full: Italki 的点评人 Luke Caruso

author: Luke Caruso
title: Luke Caruso
text:
I would (and have) recommend this to people looking to take the next step in there language learning. There is nothing more beneficial than being able to talk to a native. I use italki to learn German and Spanish and the website is easy enough to be able to find the teachers I require. I am also an English tutor on the website and if I have had problems in the past the customer service team have been quick to reply to my questions, (However the replies weren't in English)
Perfect website!!
